translations.source: 表15-2   主要生产场所及建构筑物的火灾爆炸危险性表
translations.target: Table 15-2  Fire and Explosion Hazards of Major Production Areas and Buildings/Structures

translations.source: 在厂区总平面布置时，按生产性质、工艺要求及火灾危险性的大小等分成相对独立的小区，各区间以道路相隔，各建筑物之间留有足够的防火间距。厂区道路呈环型布置，物流大门主物流通道采用12米，其它道路均为6米道路，道路上空净空高度大于5米，满足消防车辆通行的要求。
translations.target: In the overall plant layout, the site is divided into relatively independent zones according to production characteristics, process requirements, and the degree of fire hazard. The zones are separated by roads, and adequate fire separation distances are reserved between buildings. The plant roads are arranged in a ring layout. The main logistics corridor at the logistics gate is 12 m wide, and all other roads are 6 m wide. The vertical clearance above the roads is greater than 5 m, meeting the access requirements for fire engines.

translations.source: 为保证消防设施的可靠性，所有消防设施均设两路电源供电，消防水泵设施采用自动启动控制。并在主要生产场所设事故照明。
translations.target: To ensure the reliability of firefighting facilities, all firefighting systems are supplied by dual power sources, and the fire water pump system adopts automatic start-up control. Emergency lighting is also provided in the main production areas.

translations.source: 为了防止雷击造成的损害，拟对中央变电所、汽机房等第一类防雷建筑物采用接闪器，使被保护的建筑物、设备、放散管、风帽等突出物体处于保护范围，并设独立的接地装置，接地电阻不大于10Ω。对除尘地面站等第二类防雷建筑物，采用避雷带措施，引下线不少于两根，并沿建筑物四周均匀对称布置，接地电阻不大于10Ω。对焦炉烟囱、煤塔、煤焦转运站等第三类防雷建筑物采取避雷带防雷措施，接地电阻不大于30Ω，防止雷击造成的危害。
translations.target: To prevent damage caused by lightning strikes, air-termination devices will be adopted for Class I lightning-protection buildings such as the central substation and turbine hall, so that protruding objects such as protected buildings, equipment, vent stacks, and cowls fall within the protection zone. An independent grounding system will be provided, with a grounding resistance not greater than 10 Ω. For Class II lightning-protection buildings such as the dust-collection ground station, lightning belts will be adopted. Not less than two down conductors will be provided and arranged uniformly and symmetrically around the perimeter of the building, with a grounding resistance not greater than 10 Ω. For Class III lightning-protection buildings such as the coke oven stack, coal tower, and coal/coke transfer station, lightning belt measures will be adopted, with a grounding resistance not greater than 30 Ω, to prevent hazards caused by lightning strikes.

translations.source: 在生产重要场所如粉碎机房、焦炉煤塔、余热锅炉、汽轮机房、配电室、车间办公楼等均设有火灾自动报警装置。
translations.target: Automatic fire alarm systems are installed in key production areas such as the crusher house, coke oven coal tower, waste heat boiler, turbine hall, power distribution room, and workshop office building.

translations.source: 爆炸燃烧场所的通风设备均选用非燃体材料。在防爆区的通风设备均选用防爆型，并采用接地消除静电措施。
translations.target: Ventilation equipment in areas with explosion and fire hazards shall be made of non-combustible materials. Ventilation equipment in explosion-hazard areas shall be of explosion-proof type, and grounding measures shall be adopted to eliminate static electricity.

translations.source: 本项目消防给水管网为室内外消火栓合用，室外消防管网呈环状布置，采用地上式消火栓，消火栓间距≤120米，保护半径为150米。
translations.target: The fire water supply network of this project serves both indoor and outdoor hydrants. The outdoor fire water network is arranged in a ring configuration and uses above-ground hydrants. The hydrant spacing is ≤ 120 m, and the protection radius is 150 m.

translations.source: 第2章 炼焦工艺简介
translations.target: Chapter 2  Introduction to the Coking Process
